subject: [Radiance-general] Tutorial additions - gendaymtx & annualdctimestep
body:
Hi Andy,

This is great! Thanks for including the new items.

As a more general question, I had noticed that gendaymtx depends on the
wea weather file format from Daysim, is there some reason that it does
not take something more generalized such as epw?

Thanks,

-Jack

On 4/3/2013 2:01 PM, Andrew McNeil wrote:
